user.ENG:
TAI CHI
Tai Chi is an ancient form of meditative exercise which originated in China, It can be easily recognized by its slow, captivating movements. Originally Tai Chi was developed as a martial art but it is now practiced by millions of people around the world to improve and maintain good health.
The Tai Chi taught in this club is a simplified routine, which contains the traditional characteristics and postures. This routine requires only a small amount of space and can be easily practiced in your own home.
Time：Every Sunday, Beginner 2:00-3:00 pm. Intermediate 3:00-4:00 pm Location：Central Library (850 Ouellette, Windsor) Registration：ccigw2005@gmail.com, Tel: 519-255-6770 ext 4579 Course info: ccigw2005@gmail.com CS-Johness 14:40:26
user.CHI:
太极拳学习班
太极拳是祖国古老的健身防身术之一。这项运动动作舒展，节奏平缓，特别适合中老年人。长期坚持训练，定能益寿健体。 温莎市中心图书馆与大温莎中国艺术学院此次联手合办太极养生学习班，就是为了给本地的中老年人提供一个集体练习研讨的机会和场地。本学习班全部课程免费，由资深老师现场示范指正。主办单位还计划定期举办有关营养保健美容及食品卫生等的讲座。 希望有意者踊跃参加并给与宝贵建议，使这项活动日趋完美，更符合各位的要求。
上课时间：周日下午：3：00-4：30 pm 上课地点：Central Library (850 Ouellette, Windsor) 上课日期：Feb. 3, 17, 24；March: 3, 10, 17；April: 7, 14, 21, 28；May: 5, 12 学费：免费 注册：1:00-2:30 pm, Jan. 27, 2013 in Central Library 咨询：ccigw2005@gmail.com, 519-250-6351
